short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Suggest coding problems everyday, week's unsolved problems and favourite problems.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Codesistant suggests coding problems everyday as per user's preference . User can set choice on options page. Unsolved problems are accumulated under week's unsolved problems, so that user can solve it in a week's time. After a week has been passed week's pending problems get deleted. We can also add problems to favourite section. Codeforces section is currently visible while Leetcode and GFG is under construction.
